name: ander
description: Use the "and" list patterns from CLDR for rendering lists of items in a locale-specific format
author: Andreas Lind <andreaslindpetersen@gmail.com>

scripts.ci: npm run extract-data && npm run build && npm run coverage && npm run lint
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --all -- mocha --reporter dot && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.build: rm -fr dist && mkdir dist && for BUILD in common all; do BUILD=${BUILD} rollup --config rollup.config.js --sourcemap --format umd --name fontTracer -o dist/${BUILD}.js lib/index.js; done
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run extract-data && npm run build
